Plot: Two kids secretly take in stray dogs at a vacant hotel.
Title: Hotel for Dogs
Writer: Jeff Lowell (screenplay), Robert Schooley (screenplay), Mark McCorkle (screenplay), Lois Duncan (book)
Actors: Emma Roberts, Jake T. Austin, Don Cheadle, Johnny Simmons
tomatoConsensus: Hotel for Dogs may appeal to children and dog lovers, but it's ultimately contrived, predictable, and simplistic.
